name: Legend of Lua (Prototype)
description:
This entire project is on GitHub:
https://github.com/kyleschaub/legend-of-lua

This is an early build meant to verify that the game successfully runs on Windows and Mac, has good performance, and scales appropriately for different screen sizes. Additionally, I am interested in feedback regarding how the game feels to control and if there are any major bugs. Please understand that this is a small prototype, and there is much more content planned!

Follow this project on YouTube and TikTok:
https://www.youtube.com/challacade
https://www.tiktok.com/@challacade

Feel free to provide feedback in the comments on this page, or better yet, please join my game development Discord!
https://discord.gg/csNV7nPtxx
